name: report-notify
description: Simple BlazeCast report management using websockets

scripts.start: (CR=$(printf '') && tsc -w | sed "s/\$/$CR/") & (cd ../../ && iex -S mix) ; kill -9 $(for p in $(pgrep node); do ps aux | grep $p | grep -v grep | grep tsc | awk '{ print $2 }' ;done)

author: Eric des Courtis
